* Xavier Noria <fxn@...> [2007-12-24 12:55]:
> I am not familiar with that terminology, would you please
> explain "extension"? Which URLs and semantics does it have?

It doesn’t have anything to do with URLs, it’s just a namespaced
element or attribute within an Atom Entry document.

(The Feed Rank extension draft might be a starting point; but I
have to add the disclaimer that I’ve never really looked at it.)

Regards,
